resources.string: Before you can use &app_display_name;, you must install Samsung Internet 4.0 or above.

1. Open Samsung Internet.
2. Tap More and select Settings.
3. Tap Advanced.
4. Tap Block content.
5. Activate the Block content functionality.
6. Select &app_display_name; for Samsung Internet.

1. Open Samsung Internet.
2. Tap  ⋮  and select Extensions.
3. Tap Content blockers.
4. Select &app_display_name; for Samsung Internet.
